display_long_description:
Wall Town Wonders is a mixed reality game that turns your living room into a lively miniature town. Help colorful characters build their world through fun quests and mini-games, unlocking unique buildings and surprises along the way.

# Christmas update is live now! Don't miss the chance to unlock the unique Christmas Trophy

[media]

# Winner of the European technical achievment and Belgium XR-Game of 2025

[media]

# Dating feature added: choose how you let your Towns Folk date!

[media]

💬 "This could win Mixed-Reality Game of the Year!" - **The Elite Institute**

💬 "A Mixed Reality City Builder with Tons of Charm." - **Road To VR**

💬 "Wall Town Wonders is the best surprise of 2024 on Meta!" - **Quel Tizio In VR**

💬 "Charming, cozy, and addictive. I didn't intend to, but played for hours on my first try." - **GameList+**

💬 "One of the best mixed reality experiences to date!" - **Gamekod3**

# Mixed reality cosy life sim city builder:
Dive into a world where you will experience MR like never before, with unique interactions and highly detailed environments.

[media]

# Innovative Handtracking and Interactions: 
Experience the magic of interacting with your town's people using just your bare hands.

[media]

# Gentle and Relaxing Gameplay: 
Play, discover, and nurture your town at your own pace in a tranquil and soothing environment, perfect for unwinding and relaxation.

[media]

# Endless Customization and Exploration: 
Collect countless new looks and customization options for your city through gameplay and exploration.
